Title: Windows Phone 7 Silverlight ListBox with CheckBox Control
Description:
A Windows Phone 7 ListBox control, providing CheckBoxes for item selection when in "Choose State" and no CheckBoxes in "Normal State", like the built-in Email app, with nice transition.
To switch between states, set the "IsInChooseState" property.
The control inherits ListBox.
